description.english: Collected all 100 crystals
description.french: Tu as récupéré 100 gemmes.
description.spanish: Has conseguido los 100 CRISTALES.
description.schinese: 集齐所有 100 块水晶
description.japanese: クリスタルを 100こ あつめる
description.brazilian: Coletou todos os 100 cristais.

displayName.japanese: ヒューストン、じたいは かいけつだ

description.english: Mission complete! You teleported a star seed home
description.german: Mission abgeschlossen! Du hast einen STERNSAMEN nach Hause teleportiert.
description.french: Mission accomplie ! Tu as téléporté une GRAINE ÉTOILE vers la Terre.
description.spanish: ¡Misión cumplida! Has teletransportado una SEMILLA ESPACIAL hasta casa.
description.schinese: 任务完成！你已送回星球种子
description.russian: Миссия завершена! ЗВЕЗДНОЕ СЕМЕЧКО телепортировано домой
description.japanese: ミッション かんりょう！スターシードを ぼせいに テレポートした。
description.brazilian: Missão concluída! Você teletransportou uma SEMENTE DE ESTRELA de volta para casa.

description.english: Collected all star seeds
description.french: Tu as récupéré toutes les GRAINES ÉTOILE.
description.spanish: Has conseguido todas las SEMILLAS ESPACIALES.
description.schinese: 集齐所有星球种子
description.japanese: スターシードを ぜんぶ あつめる
description.brazilian: Coletou todas as SEMENTES DE ESTRELA.

description.english: Grown 50 star shoots
description.french: Tu as fait pousser 50 POUSSES ÉTOILE.
description.spanish: Has hecho crecer 50 BROTES ESTELARES.
description.schinese: 长出 50 条星球枝桠
description.japanese: スターシュートを 50ぽん そだてる
description.brazilian: Germinou 50 DISPAROS DE ESTRELA.

description.english: Bounced on 50 spring leaves
description.french: Tu as rebondi sur 50 FEUILLES RESSORT.
description.spanish: Has saltado sobre 50 HOJAS MUELLE.
description.schinese: 在 50 枚弹簧叶上弹跳
description.japanese: とびはねた スプリングリーブが 50まい
description.brazilian: Pulou em 50 FOLHAS PRIMAVERA.

displayName.japanese: グライダーの たつじん

description.english: Spent a total of 30 minutes gliding
description.french: Tu as passé un total de 30 minutes à planer.
description.spanish: Has pasado 30 minutos planeando.
description.schinese: 滑翔时间达到 30 分钟
description.japanese: グライダーの ひこうじかんが ごうけい 30ぷん
description.brazilian: Gastou um total de 30 minutos planando.

description.english: Used 50 fall flowers
description.french: Utilise 50 Fleurs de chute
description.spanish: Has usado 50 flores de caída otoñal.
description.schinese: 用过 50 次降落花
description.japanese: フォールフラワーを ５０こつかった
description.brazilian: Usou 50 Flores do Outono.

description.english: Find a warble creature
description.french: Trouve un Trille
description.spanish: Encuentra una criatura Trino.
description.schinese: 找到一只嘟嘟鸟
description.japanese: ウォーブルをみつける
description.brazilian: Encontrou uma criatura Trinado.

description.english: Freefall over 1000m and survive
description.german: 1 000 m im Freien Fall und überlebt
description.french: Tu as survécu à une chute libre de plus de 1 000 m.
description.spanish: Has caído desde una distancia de 1000 m y has sobrevivido.
description.schinese: 跌落 1,000 米并生还
description.japanese: 1000mの たかさから おちて ぶじに ちゃくちする
description.brazilian: Caiu livremente de mais de 1.000 m e sobreviveu.

displayName.french: C'est une bien mauvaise altitude que tu as là

description.english: Trigger over 100 altitude warnings
description.french: Déclenche plus de 100 avertissements sur l'altitude
description.spanish: Activa más de 100 avisos de altitud.
description.schinese: 触发 100 次高度警告
description.japanese: ひょうこう１００いじょう けいこく
description.brazilian: Ativou mais de 100 alertas de altitude.

displayName.spanish: Bajo tierra y en la superficie

description.english: Discover all caves
description.french: Tu as découvert toutes les grottes.
description.spanish: Has descubierto todas las cuevas.
description.schinese: 探出所有洞穴
description.japanese: どうくつを ぜんぶ みつける
description.brazilian: Descobriu todas as cavernas.

displayName.french: Un petit robot qui grimpe, qui grimpe
displayName.japanese: のぼる のぼる ロボット

description.english: Climbed over 10000m on any surface
description.german: Über 10 000 m auf beliebigen Oberflächen geklettert.
description.french: Grimpe plus de 10 000 mètres sur n'importe quelle surface
description.spanish: Has trepado más de 10 000 m en cualquier superficie.
description.schinese: 爬过 10,000 米（地点不限）
description.russian: Подъем на 10 000 м, вскарабкавшись по любой поверхности
description.japanese: どんなところでも 10000m以上のぼった
description.brazilian: Escalou mais de 10.000 m em qualquer superfície.

description.english: Float a warble creature in an anti-gravity flower
description.german: Lasse eine Wauz-Kreatur in einer Antigravitationsblume schweben.
description.french: Fais flotter un Trille dans une fleur antigravité
description.spanish: Haz flotar a un Trino en una flor antigravedad.
description.schinese: 让一只嘟嘟鸟悬浮在反重力花上
description.russian: Удачная попытка завести певуна в антигравитационный цветок
description.japanese: はんじゅうりょくのはなで ウォーブルをうかせる
description.brazilian: Fez uma criatura Trinado flutuar em uma flor antigravidade.

description.english: Teleport with a meep creature
description.french: Tu t'es téléporté avec une créature Mout.
description.spanish: Te has teletransportado con una criatura Meep.
description.schinese: 传送一个毛羊生物
description.japanese: ミープと いっしょに テレポートする
description.brazilian: Teletransportou-se com uma criatura Mip.

description.english: Suspend 5 different plants in the tele-router device
description.german: Werde 5 unterschiedliche Pflanzen im Tele-Router los.
description.french: Suspends 5 plantes différentes sur le télé-routeur
description.spanish: Cuelga 5 plantas distintas en el Tele-Router.
description.schinese: 在传送器设备里放 5 种不同植物
description.japanese: テレルーターに５つの ちがうしょくぶつを うかせる
description.brazilian: Suspendeu 5 plantas diferentes no dispositivo tele-roteador.

description.english: Drowned 3 defenceless meep creatures. You monster!
description.french: Tu as noyé 3 créatures Mout sans défense. Espèce de monstre !
description.spanish: Has ahogado a 3 criaturas Meep indefensas. ¡Monstruo!
description.schinese: 把 3 头毫无防备的毛羊淹死。你个变态！
description.russian: Утопление 3 беззащитных овеков. Ты просто монстр!
description.japanese: むぼうびな ひつじを 3とう おぼれさせる。ひどいやつ！
description.brazilian: Afogou 3 criaturas Mip indefesas. Seu monstro!

displayName.japanese: ガスもれ ちゅうい

description.english: Accumulated over 10 minutes airtime using the rocket-pack
description.german: 10 Minuten mit dem RAKETENRUCKSACK in der Luft verbracht.
description.french: Tu as totalisé plus de 10 minutes de vol avec les PROPULSEURS.
description.spanish: Has pasado más de 10 minutos volando con la MOCHILA PROPULSORA.
description.schinese: 使用火箭背包累计飞行 10 分钟
description.russian: Полет на РАКЕТНОМ УСКОРИТЕЛЕ в течение 10 минут
description.japanese: ロケットパックで とんだジカンが ごうけい10ぷんいじょう
description.brazilian: Acumulou mais de 10 minutos no ar usando o PACOTE-FOGUETE.

description.english: Have 3 star shoots growing at the same time
description.french: Fais pousser 3 POUSSES ÉTOILE en même temps.
description.spanish: Has tenido 3 BROTES ESTELARES creciendo a la vez.
description.schinese: 同时让 3 条星球枝桠生长
description.japanese: 3ぼんの スターシュートを どうじに せいちょうさせる
description.brazilian: Teve 3 DISPAROS DE ESTRELA crescendo ao mesmo tempo.

description.english: Combo a mushroom bounce for 2 minutes without landing
description.german: Kombiniere einen Pilzsprung 2 Minuten lang, ohne zu landen.
description.french: Rebondis sur un champignon pendant 2 minutes sans t'arrêter
description.spanish: Haz un combo de saltos de seta durante dos minutos sin aterrizar.
description.schinese: 在蘑菇上连续弹 2 分钟不落地
description.russian: Прыжки на грибах в течение 2 минут подряд
description.japanese: チャクチせずに 2ふんかん キノコのうえを ジャンプしつづける
description.brazilian: Fez um combo com um pulo de cogumelo por 2 minutos sem pousar.

description.english: Glide under all the rock arches in the game
description.german: Gleite durch alle Felsbögen im Spiel.
description.french: Plane sous toutes les arches de pierre du jeu.
description.spanish: Has planeado por debajo de todos los arcos de las rocas.
description.schinese: 滑过游戏中的所有石拱
description.japanese: ゲームないの いわのアーチを すべて グライダーで くぐりぬける
description.brazilian: Planou por baixo de todos os arcos de rocha do jogo.

description.english: Make it through your first night.
description.french: Survis à ta première nuit.
description.spanish: Sobrevive a la primera noche.
description.schinese: 度过第一晚。
description.japanese: はじめての よるを、うまく のりきる
description.brazilian: Sobreviveu à sua primeira noite.

description.english: Catch and collect a falling leaf glider in mid-air
description.german: Fange und sammle ein fallendes Gleitblatt in der Luft.
description.french: Attrape et récupère une Feuille planeur en vol.
description.spanish: Has atrapado una hoja planeadora caída en mitad del aire.
description.schinese: 抓住并收集在空中滑落的叶片
description.russian: Ловко поймать и забрать падающий листоплан в воздухе
description.japanese: まいおちる リーフグライダーを クウチュウで つかまえる
description.brazilian: Pegou um planador de folha do outono no meio do ar.

displayName.japanese: いっしょに とぼうよ

description.english: Take a Meep creature for a flight for at least 10 seconds
description.german: Nimm eine Mäh-Kreatur für mindestens 10 Sekunden zum Fliegen mit.
description.french: Tu as emmené une créature Mout pour un vol d'au moins 10 secondes.
description.spanish: Has volado con una criatura Meep al menos 10 segundos.
description.schinese: 抓一头毛羊生物一起飞翔 10 秒
description.russian: Полет с овеком хотя бы в течение 10 секунд
description.japanese: ミープを つかまえたまま 10びょういじょう そらをとぶ
description.brazilian: Pegou uma criatura Mip para um voo de pelo menos 10 segundos.

displayName.japanese: けがわの ビーナス

description.english: Deliver a Meep creature to the jaws of the SNAPDRAGON plant
description.german: Liefere eine Mäh-Kreatur den Fängen der LÖWENMAUL-Pflanze aus.
description.french: Porte une créature Mout dans les mâchoires d'une plante SNAPDRAGON.
description.spanish: Has entregado a una criatura Meep a las fauces de una planta BOCA DE DRAGÓN.
description.schinese: 把一头毛羊生物送进利齿植物的血盆大口
description.russian: Отправка овека в пасть растения ЛЬВИНЫЙ ЗЕВ
description.japanese: スナップドラゴンの わなに ミープを つれていく
description.brazilian: Entregou uma criatura Mip para as mandíbulas de uma planta BOCA DE DRAGÃO.

description.english: Make the Torro creature fall down the hole in the cave
description.german: Lass die Torro-Kreatur in das Loch der Höhle fallen.
description.french: Fais tomber la créature Torro dans le trou de la grotte.
description.spanish: Has hecho que Torro se cayese por el agujero de la cueva.
description.schinese: 让龙猫生物掉进洞穴的洞中
description.russian: Удачная попытка свалить торро в яму в пещере
description.japanese: トロを あなに おとして どうくつに いれる
description.brazilian: Fez a criatura Torro cair dentro do buraco da caverna.

description.english: Complete the Data Bank sub mission
description.french: Termine la mission subsidiaire de la base de données.
description.spanish: Has completado la misión secundaria Base de datos.
description.schinese: 完成数据库的次要任务
description.japanese: データバンクの サブミッションを かんりょうする
description.brazilian: Completou o preenchimento do Banco de Dados.
